name: Colossus Arm
description: Not happy with your own arms? Try this one! A powerful arm with a polished finish and a flashy design. Your best bet in just about every situation.
source: Summon a colossus arm to fight for you for the next 20 seconds. Cooldown: **300** seconds. Gain hitstun immunity for the next 20 seconds. Tap the Relic again to cancel. Normal attacks deal damage equal to {0}% of ATK and strongly launch enemies. Skills deal damage equal to {1}% of ATK and strongly suspend enemies. Cooldown: 10 seconds.

advancement.description: Fire 2 missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Fire 4 missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to **34.8%** of ATK.
Reduce physical damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Colossus Arm lasts for 30 seconds. All damage taken for this duration is reduced by **20%**.
